title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta, mix with bacon, then stir in egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Grill chicken pieces until cooked through.
Simmer tomato puree with cream and spices.
Add grilled chicken into the sauce.
